rajapakshawarun saha owunge hithaishinta erehiwa pawathwena wimarshana, lihil piliwethakin diyath kirimata idahara thibima hamuwe mahath haniyak siduwa thibena bawa pramada wi ho wataha ganimata janapathi sirisenata hakiwa thibena bawa pahadiliya.ohu ee sambandhayen danatamath eksath jathika pakshayata chodana kara awasanya.ohugema sandhanaye athapasuwim nisa, rajaye wishwasaniyathwayata, wisheshayen ohuge saha shri lanka nidahas pakshaye wishwasiyathwayata dadiwa pahara wadi thibena bawath, rate janapathiwaraya lesa thama janapriyathwaya ithama sighrayen sodapaluwa gos thibena bawath, ohu awabodha karagena atha.rajapaksha nawatha balayata paminiyahoth paudgalika washayen thamanta athwidimata siduwanu athi prathiwipakayan da, janapathi sirisenage sithe radi athiwata sakatak natha.enisawenma, muhunata muhuna hamuwi, sakachcha margayen eksath jathika paksha nayakaya samaga gataluwa wisada ganima wenuwata ohu srujuwama pahara ella kale ya.kesewuwath ohu ha samipa aaranchi margayak kiya sitiye wancha ha dushana sambandhayen pawathwena wimarshanayan pilibada janapathi sirisena noyek wara agamathi wikramasinha ha sakachcha kala bawaya.kasukusuwakata simawi thibu deya dan ratama danagena awasanya.
